Name: Goat's Tale
About the game: Goat's Tale is a precise platformer with unique physics, in which the player takes on the role of a famous goat treasure hunter, whose goal is to get to the top! Overwiew - Goat's Tale doesn't forgive mistakes. Each jump will have to be carefully thought out and a minor mistake may cause you to fall to the very bottom. - Explore the world. There are additional treasures hidden throughout the map, thanks to which you can unlock new versions of the map and more. Goat's Tale are: Immersive Gameplay. Beautiful pixelart graphics. A challenge for the best players. Fall Hours. Seriously.
